intro: The skull is a collection of 22 bones that protect the brain and sense organs.
notes: The Cranium is the 'brain box' that protects the brain.
The Mandible (lower jaw) is the ONLY movable bone in the skull.
Sutures are immovable joints that look like zig-zag lines.
The Orbit is the cavity that protects the eyes.

hotspots.label: Orbit
hotspots.info: The eye socket that protects the eyes.

hotspots.label: Mandible
hotspots.info: The only movable bone in the skull.
